name: Jewel Adventure - Match 3 Game
description:
Jewel Adventure, Match 3 In Temple or Jungle, launch gems or jewels to create matches and solve puzzles! Quality upgrade relaxing match 3 puzzle game, bring you a new game play experience!Simple but addictive!

Explore ancient ruins, in temple, jungle, or Egyptian Pyramids, Embark on a desert trip. Identify the long-lasting artifacts and follow the footsteps to find traces of the treasure. Strategy matching puzzle game made for beauty! Plan your moves carefully to use each gem match in best order to achieve each level’s target.Train your brain and make boosters to blast more temple jewels. 

Trip this jewels legendary game, it’s also loaded with adventure and fun! Join with your friends to unlock treasures, collect gold, and solve more than 2000+ unique puzzles! Go on quests, explore event levels, play in tournaments, and take on special Google Challenges and win free prizes with the Daily Spin!

Unique Matching Gameplay
- 1800+ well-designed levels and we are still updating.
- Easy to play but difficult to master!
- Quest smart in every step before you matching.
- Various adventure tools to help you through difficult levels
- Addictive puzzle game, fascinating game style, relaxing gameplay.
- Novel artistic style, eye-catching game interface.
- Suitable for people of all ages, can also help elder train brain.
- A perfect time killer, bring more game fun, never feel bored.

Fun Daily Events!
- Play daily Quests to earn prizes.
- Daily package pursuit event to help you on your adventure.
- Get free prizes with Daily Spin.
- Explore special scene to find treasure chests.

Download now!
Join us and enjoy the fantastic jewel adventure!
